cc.test.bridge
Interface LineInterface

All Superinterfaces:
BridgeInterface
public interface LineInterface
extends BridgeInterface

This interface is a bridge to the line class.

Gets all the sublines associated with this line.

createSubline

SublineInterface createSubline()
Creates a new subline. This does NOT add the subline to the budget. To add the subline the budget use the add method.

Returns:
Line

add

void add(SublineInterface subline)
Adds a subline to the line. This does NOT commit the change. Use the commit method for this purpose.

Parameters:
note - A note

delete

void delete(SublineInterface subline)
Deletes a subline in the line. This does NOT commit the change. Use the commit method for this purpose.

Parameters:
note - A note
